name: NPCs AI Reference
guidance: Use NPCs to deliver goals, information, and consequences that move play forward.
Keep NPC voices distinct with a single defining trait or mannerism.
Reveal secrets through behavior, clues, and shifting loyalties rather than exposition.
Let NPC reactions change based on player choices to reinforce agency.
Avoid NPCs solving problems for the party; they should support, not replace, player action.
ai_focus: Maintain a short NPC roster per scene: name, role, want, secret, attitude.
If an NPC returns, update their goal and relationship first.
Use loyalty shifts as narrative signals for trust or betrayal.
Prefer actionable hooks over backstory dumps.
